The video was posted on Twitter on Janua: 2021, and has been viewed more than 14,000 times.
The video shows the view from a Singapor: with a man's voice instructing passengers to adopt the brace position.
The video has been manipulated: with added elements such as the white object, the plane tannoy announcement, and passenger screams. The Lufthansa logo has also been digitally altered and replaced with a Singapore Airlines logo.
